data.name: First Day - Custom Fraction Flags Uploader
data.detailed_description: Ability to upload your own flag for a faction using the link.
data.about_the_game: Ability to upload your own flag for a faction using the link.
data.short_description: Ability to upload your own flag for a faction using the link.
data.supported_languages:
English, Russian*, French, German, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher 32 bits
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0 compatible card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher 64 bits
  • Processor: 3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible card
